Text: Halloween PartyEnron Corporation The Princeton Review and the Association of Rice Alumni would like to invite you to THE HALLOWEEN MONSTER BASH Houstons definitive allout Halloween party Friday October pm Garden in the Heights We are proud to announce the return of the Halloween Monster Bash on Friday October at Garden in the Heights You may remember this party from it was a smash success then and will be at least as much fun this year Weve got an awesome DJ and tickets include light food and all the drinks you can handle Door prizes including gift certificates from Houstons finest restaurants will be awarded for best costumes The tickets are essentially at a breakeven price but if there is any money left over it will go to Rices scholarshipfellowship fund so Rice can continue to attract even smarter harderworking students than theyve already got DETAILS Date Friday October Time PM til midnight or so Place Garden in the Heights Feagan if you need directions please call TICKETS Tickets with costume or without How to get tickets Call the Rice Alumni Office at for advance tickets or buy them at the door SPONSORSHIPS Group and corporate sponsorships are available Enron The Princeton Review and the law firm of Hirsch Westheimer have already signed on as sponsors This party is not exclusive in any way all of Houston is invited everyone over that is So please invite your friends and encourage them to come You may get other emails about this as well as we try our hardest to get the word out I hope to see you there George W Webb III Director of Partnership Programs The Princeton Review N Post Oak Rd Suite Houston TX fax
